main_definition: Not the same as something else; distinct in nature, quality, or condition.

meanings_and_examples.example: Having different hair colors is normal among siblings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Variation from one person to another
meanings_and_examples.example: Each individual has a unique fingerprint, making them different from others.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not the same in terms of opinions or perspectives
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite growing up together, they have different political views.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Disparate elements that are not unified into a single whole
meanings_and_examples.example: The room was decorated with different patterns and styles, creating an eclectic look.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not conforming to the established or common rules, standards, or practices
meanings_and_examples.example: She wore her clothes in a way that was different from others at the party.
